page.title: 04SUNDAYS IN COUSLAND
page.content: OUR CLASS OF 9-12 YEAR OLDS DID A SURVEY OF HOW WE SPEND OUR SUNDAYS. HALF THE CLASS HAVE A SPECIAL BREAKFAST,SUCH AS BACON,SAUSAGE,EGGS,FRIED BREAD OR FRUIT LOAF.SUNDAY DINNER MAY ALSO BE SPECIAL,WITH ROAST CHICKEN OR BEEF ROAST POTATOES,SALADS,SPROUTS,HOME- MADE SOUPS,CORN-ON-THE-COB,PATE,TRIFLE AND FRUIT SALAD.OFTEN FAMILY AND FRIENDS SHARE THE MEAL. A THIRD OF THE CLASS ATTEND CHURCH OR SUNDAY SCHOOL. AT HOME ON SUNDAYS WE CARE FOR OUR PETS,HELP IN THE GARDEN OR FARM,PLAY GAMES OR WATCH TELEVISION. FOR SUNDAY OUTINGS WE GO TO THE SWIMMING POOL,CASTLES,COUNTRY PARKS, GO CYCLING OR RIDING,HAVE PICNICS OR VISIT RELATIONS. ONLY TWO OF US LIKE SUNDAYS, WITH SATURDAY AS OUR FAVOURITE DAY..
